resources.string: by going with the modified payment plan

By using the information, tools, features and functionality of this application, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. You may not use our services and you may not accept this agreement if you are not of legal age to form a binding contract. If you accept this agreement, you represent that you have the capacity to be bound by it or if you are acting on behalf of a company or entity that you have the authority to bind such entity. 



The scope of this application is to allow the average user to do a much more in-depth forecast and planning that includes interest calculation, “what if” scenarios, and much more. We use graphs and charts to help customers visualize their budget and to help with the understanding of our forecast. We have an awareness and educational mission to help the public understand what the important details for the most common financial contracts (credit cards, mortgage, loans…) TallyCap exists to fill a void in the market place. We believe we bring a much needed service in those insecure financial times and tie it in with awareness and education so the customer is better informed and well prepared for future financial decisions.



TallyCap does not endorse, warrant or guarantee the products or services available through any other third-party products or services advertised on or linked from our application. TallyCap is not an agent or broker or otherwise responsible for the activities or policies of those advertisers. We do not guarantee that the loan, investment, plan or other service terms, rates or rewards offered by any particular advertiser or other third party in our application are actually the terms that may be offered to you if you pursue the offer or that they are the best terms or lowest rates available in the market. You are pursuing those offers from third-parties at your own risk.



You agree that you will not use any program, algorithm or methodology to access, acquire, copy or monitor TallyCap or any portion of our application, without our express written consent, which may be withheld in our sole discretion. You consent to not attempt to decipher, decompile, disassemble, or reverse-engineer any of the software comprising or in any way making up a part of our application.



The content and all services and products associated with our application are provided to you on an “as-is” and “as available” basis. We make no warranties of any kind as to the content or operation of our application. We make no guarantee that the content that maybe available through the application or the service is free from infection from any viruses or other code or computer programs that contain contaminating or destructive properties or that are intended to damage any system or personal information. TallyCap is not intended to provide legal, tax, or financial advice and is not a broker or tax advisor. You agree that your use of the service is at your sole risk.



TallyCap is not responsible or liable to you or any third party for any damage arising in whole or in part from your access to our application. You shall defend and hold harmless TallyCap and its officers, directors, shareholders, and employees, from and against all claims and expenses, including but not limited to attorneys fees, in whole or in part arising out of or attributable to any breach of this Agreement by you. We reserve the right to, at any time, terminate this legal agreement with you.



We may modify this Agreement from time to time. It is your responsibility to check for any and all changes to this agreement and in addition, the Agreement will always indicate the date it was last revised. You are deemed to accept and agree to be bound by any changes to the Agreement when you use the service after those changes are posted. 



If any portion of this Agreement is deemed unlawful, void or unenforceable by any arbitrator or court of competent jurisdiction, this agreement as a whole shall not be deemed unlawful, void or unenforceable, but only that portion of this Agreement that is unlawful, void or unenforceable shall be stricken from this Agreement.
